title: Extreme Amounts of Packet Loss
body: Over the last week, I have had packet loss in every game. It was up until about the 20th is the first time it happened and in every game since then I'll have 2-5 seconds where I'm frozen, cannot move but everything around me is moving normal speed. I have checked out every log in my RAD since the 20th, most games have around 1.5 - 3% packet loss. Anyone experiencing this as well?

replies.body:
It looks like your packet loss starts inside of your home network, based on the two hops listed below:
> |                             10.106.64.1 -    2 |  957 |  943 |    6 |   10 |  223 |   35 |
> |                           192.168.7.105 -    2 |  964 |  952 |    4 |    9 |  105 |   22 |

It may be a good idea to reach out to your ISP's technical support team with the full results of this traceroute and see if they'll schedule an appointment to send someone out to investigate problems with your equipment. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

> 104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here if you'd like us to help, or submit them in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
